mapper.insert: insert into faculty(userId, userName, password, roleType, mobile, email, status, isInitPwd, lastLoginIp, lastLoginTime, loginIp, loginTime) values (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{roleType}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{status}, #{isInitPwd}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{loginIp}, #{loginTime})
mapper.update: update faculty set userName = #{userName}, roleType = #{roleType}, mobile = #{mobile}, email = #{email}, status = #{status}, isInitPwd = #{isInitPwd}, lastLoginIp = #{lastLoginIp}, lastLoginTime = #{lastLoginTime}, loginIp = #{loginIp}, loginTime = #{loginTime} where userId = #{userId}
